com.example.yanghanwen.taskmanagementmonster

Class Task

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.yanghanwen.taskmanagementmonster.Task

  • public class Task
extends java.lang.Object
    Object class of task Contain the information and operation method of the current task.

      • createNewBid

        public void createNewBid(java.lang.String bidder,
                         java.lang.Double amount)
        Create a new bid object and add it into the bid list of this task If current status is requested, then change the status to bidded as there are a bid on this task.
        Parameters:
        bidder - username of user that bid this task
        amount - amount of bid that user want to bid

      • getUserAmount

        public java.lang.Double getUserAmount(java.lang.String bidder)
        By using a input username, get the user's bid amount on this task. If the user haven't bid on this task, then return null.
        Parameters:
        bidder - a user's username
        Returns:
        the Double value of user's bid on this task

      • declineBid

        public void declineBid(java.lang.String bidder)
